info.title: MAAM API
info.description: API for functionalities of the MAAM platform

put.description: Ask To Join a Workspace by workspace id

Update a User by username. If the authenticated user is an admin, it can update any other user's status (verified, enabled, role).Otherwise, they can only update their own fields (firstname, lastname, organization).
Enable User. Only admins can perform this.
Disable User. Only admins can perform this.

parameters.name: min_faces
parameters.description: Minimum number of faces depicted in the asset

parameters.name: max_faces
parameters.description: Maximum number of faces depicted in the asset

parameters.name: min_duration
parameters.description: Minimum duration of video in seconds

parameters.name: max_duration
parameters.description: Maximum duration of video in seconds

500.description: A JSON object containing information about the error

400.description: A JSON object containing information about the error

404.description: A JSON object containing information about the error

403.description: User Not Authenticated to delete Asset.

get.summary: Retrieve Asset Preview by its id
get.description: Retrieve Asset Preview by its id

updatedAt.description: Last update date of the workspace

isOwner.description: Indicates if the user is the owner of the workspace

personal.description: Indicates if the workspace is personal (private)

joined.description: Indicates if the user has joined the workspace

numberOfUsers.description: Number of users in the workspace

numberOfAsset.description: Number of assets in the workspace

start.description: Annotation start time in case of video annotation

end.description: Annotation end time in case of video annotation

createdBy.description: The user that created the annotation

machineGenerated.description: Indicates if the annotation was generated by an ai model

primaryFile.description: Indicates if the file is the primary file associated with the asset

assetKey.description: The key of the asset that the deepfake analysis task is related to.

startedAt.description: The date and time that the deepfake analysis task started.

completedAt.description: The date and time that the deepfake analysis task completed.

status.description: The status of the deepfake analysis task. It can be STARTED, COMPLETED or FAILED.

message.description: The message of the deepfake analysis task in case of failure.

reports.description: The reports of the deepfake analysis task.

processingTime.description: Processing time of the deepfake analysis task.

result.description: The result of the prediction for this bbox. It can be true, false or uncertain.

prediction.description: The probability of the prediction for this bbox.

left.description: The left coordinate of the bbox.

top.description: The top coordinate of the bbox.

right.description: The right coordinate of the bbox.

bottom.description: The bottom coordinate of the bbox.

timestamp.description: The timestamp of the bbox. This exists in case of video assets.

frameId.description: The frame id of the bbox. This exists in case of video assets.

name.description: The name of the deepfake detector.

title.description: A human-readable title for the deepfake detector.

intendedUse.description: The intended use of the deepfake detector.

description.description: A human-readable description for the deepfake detector.

version.description: The version of the deepfake detector.

relatedPaper.description: A paper related to the deepfake detector.

evaluationSet.description: The dataset used for the evaluation of the deepfake detector.

trainingSet.description: The dataset used for the training of the deepfake detector.

minThreshold.description: The minimum threshold for the deepfake detector.

maxThreshold.description: The maximum threshold for the deepfake detector.

falseLabelMessage.description: The message for the false label.

trueLabelMessage.description: The message for the true label.

uncertainLabelMessage.description: The message for the uncertain label.

componentNumber.description: The number of the face component detected in the shot (scene).

boundingBoxes.description: The bounding boxes of the detected face component.

error.description: Indicates if the deepfake report has an error.

message.description: The message of the deepfake report in case of an error.

prediction.description: The probability of the deepfake report.

result.description: The result of the deepfake report. It can be true, false or uncertain.

evidence.description: The evidence of the deepfake report. It can be VERY_STRONG_EVIDENCE, STRONG_EVIDENCE, MODERATE_EVIDENCE or WEAK_EVIDENCE.

evidenceMessage.description: The evidence message of the deepfake report.

detector.description: The detector used to produce the deepfake report.

numberOfShots.description: The number of shots of the deepfake report. This exists in case of video assets.

boundingBoxes.description: The bounding boxes of the deepfake report. This exists in case of image assets

shots.description: The shots of the deepfake report. This exists in case of video assets.

numberOfFaces.description: The number of face components detected in the shot (scene).

frames.description: The number of frames in the shot (scene).

prediction.description: The maximum prediction among all predictions in a shot (scene).

shot.description: The id of the shot (scene) in the video.

shotStart.description: Video timestamp that indicates the start of the scene.

shotEnd.description: Video timestamp that indicates the end of the scene.

faces.description: The face components detected in the shot (scene).

algorithmName.description: The name of the forensic algorithm.

completed.description: Indicates if the forensic algorithm execution is completed.

error.description: Indicates if the forensic algorithm execution has an error.

message.description: The message of the forensic algorithm execution in case of error.

forensicAlgorithmMaps.description: The forensic algorithm maps of the forensic algorithm.

assetKey.description: The asset key associated with the forensic analysis task.

startedAt.description: The date and time the forensic analysis task was created.

completedAt.description: The date and time the forensic analysis task was completed. Missing if the task has not been completed yer or has been failed.

status.description: The status of the forensic analysis task. It can be STARTED, COMPLETED or FAILED.

message.description: The message of the forensic analysis task in case of error (status = FAILED).

forensicAlgorithms.description: The forensic algorithms of the forensic analysis task.

id.description: The unique identifier of the join workspace request.

user.description: The user that requests to join the workspace.

workspaceId.description: The workspace that the user requests to join.

createdAt.description: The date that the request was created.

updatedAt.description: The date that the request was updated (accepted).

type.description: Available types: NUMBER_OF_WORKSPACES, NUMBER_OF_PROJECTS, TOTAL_UPLOADS_FILE_SIZE, IMAGE_FILE_SIZE, VIDEO_FILE_SIZE, VIDEO_DURATION, AUDIO_FILE_SIZE

createdBy.description: The user that created the annotation

machineGenerated.description: Indicates if the annotation was generated by an ai model

username.description: The username of the token owner
